channel.title: Releases on Apache Ozone
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Apache Ozone

item.title: Release 0.2.1-alpha available
item.description: This is the first version of Apache Hadoop Ozone. Ozone is an Object store for Hadoop built using Hadoop Distributed Data Store. This release is fully functional, but alpha quality. Image credit: Ken Lane, Acadia, CC-BY-NC-SA-2.0
